entryView.title: serial port resource manager
commands.startSaveLog: Save the log of the current terminal
commands.stopSaveLog: Stop saving the log of the current terminal
configurations.serialPort.boudRate.descr: The `baud rate` option when opening the serial port, you can add a `custom baud rate` here
configurations.log.savepath.title: Log path
configurations.log.savepath.description: Set the path to the save log directory. e.g. `c:\log` if not set, it will default to the `log` folder in the expansion path
configurations.script.savepath.title: Script path
configurations.script.savepath.descripti: Set the path to the save script notebook directory. e.g. `c:\script` if not set, it will default to the `script` folder in the expansion path
